message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I believe this reflects its worth and the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I've done some research and I believe that's a fair price for this product.
I understand your perspective, Bob. However,  $14,000 undervalues the product significantly. I'm willing to negotiate, so how about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $17,000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $15,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.
